data:
Facsimile Images

ἐπὶ τοῦ μνησ-
θησομένου
Συρακοσίου
ἀγορασίας Νί-
5κωνος καὶ Ἀβουδ-
αντίας

Apparatus criticus

Text from photograph ; Orsi: ΕΙΠ
line.5: Kaibel (after Mommsen): ΑΒΟΥΙ (sic); Agnello: ΑΒΟΥ(Ν)Δ
line.6: Orsi: ANTIAE

English translation

To the memory of Syrakosios, purchase of Nikonos and Aboudantia

commentary

Carini published the editio princeps of this text, and is in fact the only editor to read it completely accurately. Kaibel followed a transcription of Mommsen, who failed to read the small delta at the end of line 5, while Orsi was misled by the damage to the final sigma on line 6 and struggled to resolve the initial vertical strokes of line 1. Agnello appears to have followed Kaibel's text and assumed that the vertical at the end of line 5 was part of a nu, to be suppressed.

bibliography

    Carini 1874 511 no.12 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002091 14.0172 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001072 Agnello 1953 no.11 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002211 Orsi 2018 Tacc. 1, p. 88 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002617
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence
